channel.title: NetNewsWire Betas
channel.description: Most recent NetNewsWire changes with links to updates.

item.title: NetNewsWire 5.0d2
item.description:
Fixed a performance issue when fetching articles — it’s much faster now. You’ll especially notice when you select something with hundreds of articles.

Handle bad home page URLs in a feed. (AppleInsider, for instance.)

Allow .xml as an extension when importing an OPML file.

Hide cursor when paging via the space bar.
